songs.title: Dance
songs.album: A Collection of Rare and Unreleased Recordings
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Everything about you just makes me want to
Every time I see you I just want to
If you only knew how much I
You'd reconsider fooling with me
If I told you that I want to
How fast would you run I wonder
You will know the sound that’s coming
I'm playing this song just special for you

Red button red button
In my hand
Make them dance make them dance

[Chorus]
Dance dance dance for me
'at a boy 'at a boy
So so pretty
Dance dance entertain me
Too much feeling like I got to
Ah
Dance dance dance for me
'at a boy 'at a boy
So so pretty
Dance dance entertain me
No more feeling like I got to
Ah

[Verse 2]
Haha
Haha
Every time you speak I want to
Give you a little taste I'm going to
You will know the sound it's coming
The tables crashing down on you

Triger happy trigger happy
With my hands
Make them dance make them dance

[Chorus]

[Bridge]
Looking closer at the fine print here
Those chains are strings and now my hearts black tears

[Chorus]
Now you can
Dance dance dance for me
'at a boy 'at a boy
So so pretty
Dance dance entertain me
Too much feeling like I got to
Ah
Dance dance dance for me
'at a boy 'at a boy
So so pretty
Dance dance entertain me
No more feeling like I got to
Ah
